labels.label: Austin 2040
Play Again
USE
Our population is growing... Everyone needs water. There are lots of ideas about what to do...
You're the Grand Ruler of Texas, or whatever. You need to take action!
SPIN THE WHEEL AND CHOOSE WISELY!
More people moved here! Now we really need to use water wisely.
Hey, you're the one in charge here. Better do something, huh?
GO ON, SPIN THE WHEEL!
Time keeps on slippin' into the future!
Will we even make it to 2040? It's totally up to you.
TURN THAT WHEEL AND MAKE A CHOICE!
All these people need water to live and stuff. Nature needs water, too.
Better make good choices... or else.
YOU KNOW WHAT TO DO!
Wow, our population is crazy big! Can we strike a balance?
You alone decide our fate!!! (not really, but, you know, in this game)
SPIN, BABY, SPIN!
Dude, it is the future! Look at all these people.
We need a healthy, flowing river. C'mon, you got this!
GO - CHOOSE - WIN!
BONE DRY
You've doomed us all! Good thing it's just a game.
TINY TRICKLE
There's not enough for nature.
SAD STREAM
You left some water but we need more flowing downstream.
FINE FLOW
Pretty good. That's a nice river you've got there.
ROLLING RIVER
Woah! You are a genius. Please be our leader!
